title: How to Stop an Audible Subscription or Trial: Easy Guide

steps.title: Go to https://www.audible.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.audible.com/ in a web browser. If you aren't already logged in, click Sign in in the top-right corner to do so now. Use this method if you signed up for Audible using the Audible website, Amazon website, or Amazon app.

steps.title: Hover over your name.
steps.content: Hover over your name. This will be in the top-right corner. A drop-down menu will appear.

steps.title: Click Account details.
steps.content: Click Account details . This will be underneath your membership status. You may be asked to log in again.

steps.title: Click Cancel membership.
steps.content: Click Cancel membership . You can find this underneath your subscription details.

steps.title: Click Continue canceling.
steps.content: Click Continue canceling . This will confirm the action. Your Audible membership will be canceled. It will be active until the end of your final billing period.

steps.title: Open the Amazon app or go to https://www.amazon.com/.
steps.content: Open the Amazon app or go to https://www.amazon.com/ . If you aren't already signed in , enter your login information to do so now. Make sure you're signed into the account linked to your Audible . Use this method if you signed up for Audible using the Audible website, Amazon website, or Amazon app.

steps.title: Select Audible.
steps.content: Select Audible . This will be at the top of the screen next to the other categories. If you don't see it, click or tap â˜° to expand the menu. You'll see Audible Books & Originals .

steps.title: Select Audible Membership.
steps.content: Select Audible Membership . This is the first option underneath the Audible header. You'll be redirected to your membership page. If you don't have an active membership, you'll see the option to sign up for Audible Plus or Audible Premium Plus.

steps.title: Select Settings.
steps.content: Select Settings . You can find this in the top-right corner of the page.

steps.title: Select Cancel Membership.
steps.content: Select Cancel Membership . This will be underneath the Payment Preferences & Purchase header.

steps.title: Select Continue to cancel.
steps.content: Select Continue to cancel . This will confirm the action. Your Audible membership will be canceled. It will be active until the end of your final billing period.

steps.title: Open the Settings app.
steps.content: Open the Settings app. This is the grey cog icon. Use this method if you subscribed through the App Store.

steps.title: Tap your Apple ID.
steps.content: Tap your Apple ID. This is at the top of the page.

steps.title: Tap Subscriptions.
steps.content: Tap Subscriptions . You can find this underneath Payment & Shipping .

steps.title: Tap Audible.
steps.content: Tap Audible . This will be listed underneath Active .

steps.title: Tap Cancel Subscription.
steps.content: Tap Cancel Subscription . You can find this at the bottom.

steps.title: Tap Confirm.
steps.content: Tap Confirm . Your Audible subscription will be canceled.

steps.title: Open the Google Play Store.
steps.content: Open the Google Play Store. Use this method if you subscribed through the Google Play Store. If you aren't already logged in, enter your account information to do so now.

steps.title: Tap your profile icon.
steps.content: Tap your profile icon. This is at the top-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Payments and subscriptions.
steps.content: Tap Payments and subscriptions . You can find this in the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Tap Manage.
steps.content: Tap Manage . This will be next to Audible .

steps.title: Tap Cancel subscription.
steps.content: Tap Cancel subscription . A pop-up window will open. You may be asked to select a reason for canceling.

steps.title: Tap Continue.
steps.content: Tap Continue . Your Audible membership will be canceled.

steps.title: When you cancel your Audible, you'll lose membership benefits.
steps.content: When you cancel your Audible, you'll lose membership benefits. This includes any existing credits, access to exclusive discounts, and titles from the Plus Catalog. If you have existing credits, be sure to use them before the end of your last billing period. [1] X Research source If you received credits through an iOS App Store membership or Audible Google Play membership or purchased credits through these means, they will not expire. You can continue to buy audiobooks with and without a membership. Purchased titles are yours regardless of membership status.
